p: The visual identification of the calibration/validation points was performed using ArcGIS ®10.2 while R ® 3.2.1 was used for: (i) data handling raster ( Hijmans and van Etten, 2012), (ii) maptools ( Bivand and Lewin-Koh, 2012), (iii) Random Forest classification ( Liaw and Wiener, 2002) and (iv) Presence/Absence classification accuracy tests ( Freeman and Moisen, 2008).
